sn55.49:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.49:4.3: “catūhi kho, mahānāma, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti … pe …
sn55.49:5.5: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.49:5.7: Imehi kho, mahānāma, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
